register.description: The Revision Register contains the major and minor revisions for the module.

bitfield.description: RTL revision. Will vary depending on release.
Trace everything 0 = only the selected queue 1 = every queue.
Trace message data 0 = include only the operation 1 = include message data.
Queue number when tracing a single queue.
Queue to send overflow messages. A value of 0xffff will disable the overflow function.

register.description: The Error Event Register is an Output Event Steering 'OES' register that specifies the event number used to denote detection of a ring memory transaction bus error.

bitfield.description: Event to send when detecting a bus error.

register.description: Error Log Register. A read of this register will clear the pending error log event and allow a new error to be captured. It does not clear the contents of this register which are only valid while the error event is pending.

bitfield.description: Bus error was caused by a push. 0 = pop. 1 = push.
Queue that received the bus error.
